alert.note: Alert for Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Saline and northeastern Hot Spring Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Benton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Benton... Bryant... Haskell... Traskwood... Salem in Saline County... Alexander... Bauxite... Shaw... Nance... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
